metadata.title: CVE-2022-31629 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP versions before 7.4.31, 8.0.24 and 8.1.11, the vulnerability enablesnetwork and same-site attackers to set a standard insecure cookie in thevictim's browser which is treated as a `__Host-` or `__Secure-` cookie byPHP applications.

criterions.comment: php7.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
